file_content.text: Call coming in from the Sith fleet.
Greetings, Commander. It is an honor to finally speak to you.
What brought you here? I assume this is no coincidence.
Why are you here?
We are here for you, Commander. For the Alliance.
The Sith are tired of being crushed under the Eternal Empire's boot. We wish to join your cause.
You won't bow to Vaylin, but you'll bow to me?
You want me to lead you?
I am proposing an alliance of two independent powers against a common foe.
An alliance is only effective if both sides trust each other.
I'm not sure I trust you.
We are not the same Empire you once fought.
While you were frozen in carbonite, many things changed. Come to Dromund Kaas. See for yourself.
Sure. We'll head right over. That doesn't sound like a trap at all.
What would I gain by betraying you? Your followers would turn against us, and we would have even more enemies out for vengeance.
The Empress did put herself at risk by helping us on Voss. Vaylin isn't likely to forgive that.
We'll pay you a visit. I hear Dromund Kaas is lovely this time of the year.
I could use a vacation.
I will look forward to your arrival.
Guess it couldn't hurt to visit. We've got intel, but I can learn a lot more if we're there in person.
Don't do anything that will hurt the negotiations.
Remember, we'll be guests.
Understood. Don't get caught.
That's not exactly what I meant.
I'm curious to see if things really have changed since I left. Whatever we find, this trip will be interesting.
They retreated! This shouldn't have happened! This is your fault.
I gave the GEMINI droids the freedom to choose. They simply made a choice you didn't like.
They let Mother escape. I'm going to dismantle every one of those droids.
By fixating on Senya, you neglected a much greater threat: the Outlander.
My father was there too. I felt him.
And you chose to ignore him. You've been thinking like a child. Focus on the big picture.
I see it now. It's all connected, and the Outlander is the key.
Skip the pleasantries. Tell me what you want.
Let's get this over with.
I'm grateful you showed up when you did. You saved a lot of lives.
Thanks for the rescue.
Greetings, Commander. It has been a long time since we last spoke.
Dig up Acina's secrets. I expect results.
Find what she's hiding.
I always deliver.
Be careful, Theron.
We can meet, but you pull anything and the Alliance will be storming your world by sundown.
Don't cross me.
You make a compelling offer, Empress. Let's discuss this in person.
I'm willing to negotiate.
Now is the time to put aside our differences. Let's discuss this in person.
I think we can work together.
I know better than to get on your bad side.
And what would I gain from your allegiance?
What's in it for me?
So you come groveling to the Alliance to fix your problems.
And now you beg us for help.
If I remember correctly, my fleet solved your last problem.
The might of the Sith Empire at your disposal, for a start.
The Empire I remember doesn't keep allies for long.
Teamwork isn't your style.
I don't believe you.
That Empire is dead. We have learned to evolve.
Then allow me to demonstrate my allegiance.
Forgive me if I don't trust the word of a Sith.
I spent too long in the Empire to trust a word of this.
Very well. Straight to the point, then.
Stay safe. You won't exactly be among friends.
Don't make me worry about you.
Tell me about it. I'll be fine, Commander.
Maybe I like the thought of you worrying.
Mother should have been mine. I'm going to dismantle every one of those droids.
Let's say we defeat Vaylin together. What's to stop you from turning your fleet on us?
You wouldn't turn on us?
The old Empire would have betrayed you for its own gain, but we are no longer self-serving and weak.
I will be sure to give you the scenic tour.
I hope this is only the beginning of what we can do for you.
I figured the Sith would rather watch Kaas City burn than take orders from a Jedi.
You would join a Jedi?
Are the Sith really up to join the former commander of Havoc Squad?
You'd join a former enemy?
I figured you'd hold out for at least another week.
This is... unexpected.
Vaylin's reign has forced us to adapt quickly.
We will follow anyone strong enough to defeat Vaylin.
The Empress did put herself at risk by helping us here. Vaylin isn't likely to forgive that.
Call coming in from the Sith fleet. It's Empress Acina...
